Blog

0.10.1 released

17 Jan 2015

We've released a patch for the 0.10.x release series that fixes an issue with Rectangle objects determining their distance from Positionable objects.

Check out the changelog to see all the changes or head on over the Downloads section to download it now. If you're using Maven/Gradle, the release is available in our Maven repositories.
